text: Lindsay Mervyn Crocker was born 16 May, 1958 in Taumarunui and died 7 May, 2023. He was a New Zealand cricketer who played 54 first class matches for Northern Districts in the Plunket Shield during the 1980s. He was involved in administration with Auckland and New Zealand cricket. ==References== Category:1958 births Category:2023 deaths Category:New Zealand cricketers Category:Sportspeople from North Island
title: Lindsay Crocker
